txt.en: Collected a jar of honey (eat pie for a burst of energy)
You have run out of time

The Farmers Faire is nearly out of honey! The Beehives of Tuckborough are the main supplier for the Farmers Faire, so it is time to make a trip to restock.

<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>

'No! Nooooooo! No more honey! And...and I was about to drink my tea. This makes me so terribly sad. Head to the Tookland Beehives straight away to find another jar for the market and bring it back as quickly as you can.\n\n'Here...take this pie. It uses my great grand-mother's secret recipe, and it is said to lend you incredible speed when you take a bite of it. Hurry now. Do not tarry!'
The Beehives of Tuckborough are south of Bywater.\n\nYou should run to the small beehive stand along the road to the south and return with a new jar of honey before the time runs out.
'Hurray, [placeholder]! You are the hero of the Farmers Faire!'

Sperling Took, the supplier of the Farmers Faire, can be found in Bywater.\n\nYou should return to Bywater as quickly as you can, taking bites of the pie to help you along if you find yourself needing a burst of energy.
'Hurry, [placeholder]! This is not the time to dilly-dally so!'
Collect a jar of honey (eat pie for a burst of energy)
Carry the honey-jar to the Farmers Market
To the Beehives: Restocking the Honey
